title: Add Support for S/MIME in Microsoft Edge
body: Idea: Add support for S/MIME in Microsoft Edge browser. Since Microsoft Edge is the successor to IE in some regards I'm confused as to why they didn't add support for S/MIME. I, like many other government or business employees rely on this for viewing/sending encrypted mail.

comments.body: This is beyond embarrassing that Edge does not natively support S/MIME - especially sine the DoD aggressively moved to Windows 10. FIX THIS!
